Booster Bot.q: Can't find command for any feature you want to use?
Booster Bot.a: Please refer to Documentation link mentioned on top navigation bar and if it's not there in docs as well, please join support server so that we can help you properly.

Booster Bot.q: How do I see multiple greet messages?
Booster Bot.a: You can set messages 1 by 1 : `bb greet message This is a cool message` and bot will send random message with random image whenever someoen boosts the server

Booster Bot.q: How do I disable Greet Messages?
Booster Bot.a: Remove channel by `bb greet channel none` and bot will not send greet message whenever someone boosts the server.

Booster Bot.q: How do I access bot settings if I'm not an admin?
Booster Bot.a: Ask any admin to setup bot-manager role and assign that to you : `bb setup manager <role>`

Booster Bot.q: Why won't the bot respond to me on my server?
Booster Bot.a: Please make sure the prefix has not changed, and the bot is showing online in your member list. If neither of these things are the case, please contact a support specialist for further help.

Booster Bot.q: Why am I getting DMs from bot?
Booster Bot.a: You get vote reminder DM after 12 hours of your vote to remind about voting again because voting really hlps a lot and this is the only way you can support the bot. If you still don't want reminders use : `bb reminders disable` in any server where bot is in.

Support.a: Please join support server so that we can assist you properly and you will get to know newly added features which are not mentioned here ðŸ˜›

Support.q: Can't find command for any feature you want to use?
Support.a: Please refer to Documentation link mentioned on top navigation bar and if it's not there in docs as well, please join support server so that we can help you properly.

Premium.q: Where can I get premium from?
Premium.a: You can purchase premium from: https://boosterbot.xyz/premium and support the bot development :)
You can check the premium features by tying `bb premium` command in any server.
